summary: The day before a young man is to be executed for killing his girlfriend, his alcoholic father shows up to try to prove his innocence.
cast: Michael Redgrave|Ann Todd|Leo McKern|Paul Daneman|Peter Cushing|Alec McCowen|Renee Houston|Lois Maxwell|Richard Wordsworth|George Devine|Joan Plowright|Ernest Clark|Peter Copley|Hugh Moxey|Dickie Henderson|John Chandos|Vernon Greeves|Arnold Diamond|Julian Somers|Aubrey Richards|Gwynne Whitby|Marian Fawcett|Christina Lubicz|Dervis Ward|David Lander|Derek Dare|John Blaney|David Heneker|Richard Leech
title: Tiempo sin piedad
